name: screenbeard
message:
It was a labour of love. I know I did the work for the experience and the fun of it. And Ben Grubb was very good about the whole thing, and ran the comp in a very open manner.

It did however spur a rash of other similar competitions that weren't run nearly so well and had a bit of the old "getting professional design for cheap" thing going on, with people suggesting changes and improvements. In contrast, my iterations in this were not at the behest of the "client" so to speak. I think in future I'd think twice about doing it.
